about.title: About Me
about.text-p1: I have a Bachelor's degree in Technology in Web Systems, where I specialized in Web Development, learning technologies such as HTML, CSS, and Javascript for the Frontend and Node JS, Ruby on Rails, and PHP Laravel for the Backend. In the area of Web Security, I gained experience in Cyber Defense, which was my research project for the final thesis.
about.text-p2: With over five years of experience as a Programming Professor, I have refined my teaching strategies to convey knowledge in Web Development and various Frameworks to a diverse student base. My expertise also extends to mentoring in Digital Game Development, Robotics, and IoT.
about.text-p3: Recently, I developed a Recommendation System using Java Spring Boot for a distance education company. I acquired analytical skills involving statistical processes through the application of Mathematical Methods in Computing. Additionally, I have also worked on software performance and the R language.

postgraduate.title: Postgraduate - Mobile Device Programming
postgraduate.description: Specialization focused on the development of applications for mobile devices, covering everything from fundamental concepts to advanced techniques. The program includes courses such as Android development, interface design, mobile project management, integration with web services, DevOps, monetization, and programming on platforms like Flutter, React Native, and iOS.

master.title: Master's Degree - Applied Computing Methods
master.description: Project for a recommendation system in adaptive distance learning platforms.

bachelor.title: Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology - Web Systems
bachelor.description: Focused on building complete and innovative digital solutions for web and mobile, mastering all stages of the process with high quality, security, and usability. Final Thesis in the Information Security discipline, titled: A Comparative Study Between Secure Software Development Processes.
